name: Brutal Impact
description: 6 hits of raidwide physical damage that marks the beginning of the fight. Hit count increases by 1 on each subsequent use, up to a maximum of 8 hits.

name: Smash Here
description: An unmarked shared tank buster on the closest player. Requires tank swap and mitigation.

name: Sinister Seeds
description: The four closest or furthest players receive a marked AoE that drop Tendrils of Terror and inflicts a magic vuln. These create line AoEs extending cardinally and intercardinally.

name: Impact
description: Unmarked stack AoE on both healers that inflicts a magic vulnerability up debuff.

name: Explosion
description: Three proximity AoEs around the edges drop in sequence. Players must move around the arena to avoid them.

name: Smash There
description: An unmarked shared tank buster on the furthest player. Requires tank swap and mitigation.

name: Pulp Smash
description: Marked stack AoE on the healer. The boss jumps to the healer creating a small point-blank AoE, and all players take damage in a conal AoE that inflicts vulnerability.

name: Neo Bombarian Special
description: Heavy physical damage that knocks players back off the platform to the second arena.

name: Brutish Swing
description: The boss does an AoE based on the weapon in his hand. If he is tethered to a building, jumps to it halfway through the cast and casts it from there.

name: Glower Power
description: Line AoE in front of boss with unmarked circle AoEs on all players that inflicts a magic vulnerability.

name: Revenge of the Vines
description: Heavy raidwide magical damage that requires significant mitigation.

name: Abominable Blink
description: A random tank receives a proximity flare AoE marker that needs to be mitigated.

name: Sporesplosion
description: Three sets of circle AoEs on the floor that must be avoided.

name: Brutish Swing
description: The boss does an AoE based on the weapon in his hand. If he is tethered to a building, jumps to it halfway through the cast and casts it from there.

name: Glower Power
description: Line AoE in front of boss with unmarked circle AoEs on all players that inflicts a magic vulnerability.

name: Revenge of the Vines
description: Heavy raidwide magical damage that requires significant mitigation.

name: Abominable Blink
description: A random tank receives a proximity flare AoE marker that needs to be mitigated.

name: Strange Seeds
description: Four sets of two marked AoEs that drop Tendrils of Terror AoEs. Each set targets one support and one DPS.

name: Killer Seeds
description: Four stack marker AoEs that also drop Tendrils of Terror AoEs. Spawns on four players of one role.

name: Brutish Swing
description: The boss does an AoE based on the weapon in his hand. If he is tethered to a building, jumps to it halfway through the cast and casts it from there.

name: Glower Power
description: Line AoE in front of boss with unmarked circle AoEs on all players that inflicts a magic vulnerability.

name: Revenge of the Vines
description: Heavy raidwide magical damage that requires significant mitigation.

name: Powerslam
description: Breaks the arena dealing heavy physical damage, causing all players to plummet down into the third arena.

name: Brutal Impact
description: 7 hits of raidwide physical damage that requires significant mitigation.

name: Brutish Swing
description: The boss does an AoE based on the glowing weapon in his hand. He tethers to a wall and jumps to it halfway through the cast.

name: Lashing Lariat
description: Once he uses Brutish Swing, the weapon he used disappears. He will do a large line AoE from that hand's side and dash across the arena.

name: Brutish Swing
description: The boss does an AoE based on the remaining weapon in his hand. He tethers to a wall and jumps to it halfway through the cast.

name: Glower Power
description: Line AoE in front of boss with unmarked circle AoEs on all players that inflicts a magic vulnerability.

name: Slaminator
description: A tower in the middle of the arena. Must be soaked and deals massive damage as Brute Abombinator jumps to it. Tank invulnerability recommended.

name: Smash Here
description: An unmarked shared tank buster on the closest player. Requires tank swap and mitigation.

name: Brutal Impact
description: 8 hits of raidwide physical damage that requires significant mitigation.

description: Four stack marker AoEs that also drop Tendrils of Terror AoEs. Spawns on four players of one role.

description: The boss does an AoE based on the remaining weapon in his hand. He tethers to a wall and jumps to it halfway through the cast.

description: A tower in the middle of the arena. Must be soaked and deals massive damage as Brute Abombinator jumps to it. Tank invulnerability recommended.

description: An unmarked shared tank buster on the furthest player. Requires tank swap and mitigation.

name: Special Bombarian Special (Enrage)
description: Enrage wipe mechanic that occurs at 11:10 into the fight.
